title: Easy Blini (Russian Pancake) Recipe
description: This blini recipe is simple and delicious. Enjoy these Russian-style pancakes that are thin like crepes with caviar, lox, or something sweet.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Breakfast and Brunch Crepes Easy Blini (Russian Pancake) 4.9 (14) 14 Reviews 9 Photos This blini recipe makes bite-sized pancakes that result in perfect appetizers. Top blini with smoked salmon, creme fraiche, or even caviar. Add a sprig of dill and they are sure to impress. My children also love eating these plain too! Submitted by Happykat Updated on June 17, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 9 9 9 9 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 15 mins Total Time: 25 mins Servings: 5 Yield: 20 blini Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 5 servings 1 cup all-purpose flour ¾ teaspoon salt ½ teaspoon baking powder ¾ cup milk 2 tablespoons milk 1 large egg 1 tablespoon melted unsalted butter 1 tablespoon unsalted butter Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Combine flour, salt, and baking powder in a bowl. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Whisk 3/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons milk, egg, and 1 tablespoon melted butter together in a separate bowl. Mix into the flour mixture until the batter is fully combined. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Heat 1 tablespoon butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat. Cooking several blini at a time, drop batter, one tablespoon at a time, onto the heated skillet. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook until bubbles form, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes. Flip and continue cooking until brown, about 1 minute more. Move to a paper towel-lined plate to help soak up excess butter. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Repeat with the remaining batter. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Recipe Tip For a more traditional taste, replace 1/3 cup of the all-purpose flour with 1/3 cup of buckwheat flour. I Made It Print 46 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 167 Calories 7g Fat 21g Carbs 5g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 5 Calories 167 % Daily Value * Total Fat 7g 8% Saturated Fat 4g 19% Cholesterol 53mg 18% Sodium 401mg 17% Total Carbohydrate 21g 8% Dietary Fiber 1g 2% Total Sugars 2g Protein 5g 11% Vitamin C 0mg 0% Calcium 89mg 7% Iron 1mg 8% Potassium 102mg 2% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Easy Blini (Russian Pancake) 01 of 09 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 09 Photo by  DizzyRoe1226 09/07/2024 A keeper! Trying to make these to surprise my Russian in-laws to enjoy with their caviar for a birthday party later today got to say they’re turning out fabulous. 03 of 09 Photo by  BriefThyme9455 03/13/2023 I made this last Sunday and it was perfectly delicious everybody(guest) loves it. must try it guys☺️😋😋 04 of 09 Photo by  Phillip Jones 07/22/2022 very good 05 of 09 Photo by  Rene Lafayette 09/19/2021 My wife and I made these and were very pleased with the results. Using buckwheat flour gave a slight nutty flavor and was authentic. I have been to a reception where instead of smoked salmon or caviar, thinly sliced rare roast beef with a horseradish cream was equally delicious. 06 of 09 Photo by  Rene Lafayette 09/19/2021 My wife and I made these and were very pleased with the results. Using buckwheat flour gave a slight nutty flavor and was authentic. I have been to a reception where instead of smoked salmon or caviar, thinly sliced rare roast beef with a horseradish cream was equally delicious. 07 of 09 Photo by  Mackenzie 04/27/2020 08 of 09 Photo by  Olga Sergeevna Kim 01/21/2019 I found this recipe to be good. I did end up adding more milk (maybe a cup) and a little bit of sugar. But with those two additions it was just like my mother's recipe from Russia. 09 of 09 Photo by  AllrecipesPhoto 10/02/2017 1 You’ll Also Love Blini - Russian Pancakes 2 Ratings Oladi (Russian Kefir Pancakes) 5 Ratings Russian Cheese Pancakes (Syrniki) 6 Ratings Blini (Russian Pancakes) 49 Ratings Low-Carb Cassava Crepes Blinis 1 Rating Flourless Crepe Tortillas 8 Ratings Polish Nalesniki 4 Ratings Russian Tea Cakes 1,594 Ratings Jian Bing (Chinese Crêpes) 8 Ratings Traditional Russian Pirozhki 85 Ratings Authentic Swedish Pancakes 81 Ratings French Toast 2,197 Ratings Fluffy Flapjack Pancakes 58 Ratings Tasty Protein Pancakes 1 Rating Fluffy Swedish Pancakes 117 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
